summary: A mild-mannered banker is forced to masquerade as a notorious gangster and pimp.
cast: José Garcia|Gilbert Melki|Carmen Maura|Arsène Mosca|Jo Prestia|Catalina Denis|Alain Fromager|Laurent Bateau|Doudou Masta|Marie-Laetitia Bettencourt|Mouni Farro|Eric Defosse|Paco Boublard|Sylvain Wiltord|Corentin Amado|Valentin Amado|Vincent Bersoulle|Laurent Biras|Sybille Blouin|Guillaume Briat|Vince Castello|Joseph Chanet|Xing Xing Cheng|Xiao Fang Fang|Michel Ferracci|Dan Herzberg|Toni Hristov|Philippe Josserand|Vincent Lambert|Jean-François Malet|Fabrice Michel|Marie-Philomène Nga|Pascal Parmentier|Luc Schwarz|Tien Shue|Jade Chkif|Mahamadou Coulibaly|Jamel Elgharbi|David Serero
title: Le mac
